advance.mayday.mayday_banner_pattern: Congratulations on gathering five pumpkins! You received the Mayday Banner Pattern as a reward. You can now make a banner with it.
advance.mayday.ashin.description: You got the Ashin Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.monster.description: You got the Monster Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.masa.description: You got the Masa Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.stone.description: You got the Stone Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.ming.description: You got the Ming Pumpkin! Try wearing it or use it to make a pumpkin lantern.
advance.mayday.ashin_lantern.description: You got the Ashin Lantern! Stay real, embrace the world.
advance.mayday.monster_lantern.descripti: You got the Monster Lantern! Score or not, face it with courage.
advance.mayday.masa_lantern.description: You got the Masa Lantern! Simple moments, timeless tales.
advance.mayday.stone_lantern.description: You got the Stone Lantern! Watch the stars, let the past fade.
advance.mayday.ming_lantern.description: You got the Ming Lantern! Even superman has regrets.
advance.mayday.final.description: Congratulations on lighting all five pumpkins! Lights up, curtain falls.
